text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Well then, I'll see you again at training after school. 
I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me……are you tired, perhaps? 
Make sure to get a nice long rest. ……Well then.

It had been a few days since I signed that contract with 
Dream Journey. Everything was going well and she was even 
looking after me……that atmosphere from a few days ago was gone.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer-san!

It was the girl I had planned on talking to 
before. In the end, I was never able to contact 
her after that and I was a little worried……

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
I completely forgot to send you a message…… 
I just wanted to apologize for that. But, as I 
thought, you're looking after Journey-san. I'm glad!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
Huh, Journey-san told you didn't she? 
She helped change which trainer would be instructing me!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
On that day, Journey-san……had an appointment with a 
popular trainer. Super famous and with an amazing career!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
When I told Journey-san how amazing it was, she offered to 
switch trainers! She said she'd talk to you herself, and then……――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I also don't think I'm lacking. However……if there 
isn't a trainer that can see that, then I can't debut.

――That scent once again came to mind……This time, stronger than 
before. She had, without a doubt……"lied" at that moment.

I wasn't sure if I should ask her, but……there 
might not be any deep meaning behind it so I decided 
to ask her directly after school. And then――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry……for not mentioning it. I thought it 
would be better that way. Because she……well, 
she had chosen a trainer other than you after all.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
If you learned the truth, I thought it might hurt you, but……on 
the contrary, I seemed to have cause some confusion……I'm sorry.

I suppose it was out of kindness. 
However, there was still something that was on my mind.

Compared to a rookie like me, a trainer with a good record 
would have been more helpful. However, she……hadn't chosen that.

text_block_list.name: Big Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
――Well what do you know? Her trainer's here too. But, 
well……we finally found you, didn't we, "Onee-chan"?

In that moment, 2 Uma Musume surrounded Dream Journey. 
Their larger build made them give off an intimidating aura.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……Do you have some business with me? 
I'm in the middle of a conversation right now……

text_block_list.name: Sketchy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, it's kind of urgent, you see? It's your little sister…… 
about Orfevre. She's just so full of herself. That attitude 
is probably the only thing strong about her, right?

text_block_list.name: Sketchy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
But you see, her "Onee-chan" on the other hand, seems 
like she's just sooooo kind, right? She won't listen to 
a word we say, so we just wanted your cooperation, you see?

text_block_list.name: Big Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Even that overbearing little sister……would be troubled if 
anything happened to her older sister, don't you think?

I didn't know all the details, but it seems 
like they were directing their frustrations 
with Orfevre at her sister, Dream Journey.
choice_data_list: Have you talked to Orfevre already?
Have you talked to Orfevre already?

text_block_list.name: Sketchy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Don't you know anything about her? She can barely 
hold a conversation. No matter what we say, it's pointless!

Seeing her in person, it felt more like she was 
overflowing with dignity. Behind that gaze was 
something that could see through everything……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I understand. 
Let me get this straight.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Both of you say that you don't like my little 
sister. Because she doesn't have much ability 
and still acts full of herself……is that right?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
And you want me to do something about it…… 
Yes, I understand. Rather, I'd say I'm 
thankful for that. I can finally get to work.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Well then――how about a race? 
As her older sister……I'll "finish" this.

text_block_list.name: Sketchy Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Tch, this is so annoying! Let's just show her the 
difference between us and get this over with! Haaaaa!

They were boasting about their strength, and their running 
was powerful. They started pulling away on the long straight……

On the other hand, Dream Journey was staying in the back, 
intently observing both of them. That gaze felt somewhat empty――

text_block_list.name: Big Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
……! W-what's with her……so creepy……! 
We're moving ahead further on the straight!!

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
――Yes. Acknowledged. 
……!!!!

My breathing stopped. Dream Journey accelerated instantly…… 
with a tremendous number of steps, before I realized it――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: And――we're done here.

She soared past them, and with a difference of one length, Dream 
Journey crossed the goal. I could feel my heart pounding――

――I was reminded of something in the past. It suddenly 
came to me, along with the memory of her scent……

It was……after the Uma Musume I had been cheering on had 
finally won……After a long, long time, at a major race.

The clouds overhead were dark and heavy. However, 
that Uma Musume's fans had packed the racetrack on 
a rainy Saturday, praying for her first victory.

I was there too, hoping for the same thing, waiting 
anxiously for the race to start…… Suddenly, I spotted 
a small Uma Musume looking for a place to watch from.
choice_data_list: ……It's easier to see from here, wanna switch?

text_block_list.text:
I let her take my spot, and started chatting 
with her……I found out she was here to cheer on 
the same Uma Musume, and the conversation grew lively.
choice_data_list: I believe today she'll win for sure!

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, of course. 
Anego――won't lose.

Were those words prophetic……? She ended up defying 
the competition and won her first victory in a while 
responding to the cheers of the fans――

After getting swept up in the emotion, I suddenly 
looked next to me……she wasn't there anymore. 
――The only thing left behind was a distinctive scent.
